name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Predict Sweet Spot Digital Media Cookie

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures cookies for Linkedin & Instagram, which are then used to gather data for your Ideal Customer Profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension with Predict Sweet Spot Digital Media http://predictsweetspotdigital.com). It captures your cookies for Instagram and Linkedin which are then used to gather data for your Ideal Customer Profile predictions and analytics. Note: without this extension, Predict Sweet Spot Digital Media  will not be able to process data from Instagram and/or Linkedin.
